description.en:
"The Idle StoneAge is a synthetic NFT concept dual-end (web/mobile) game deployed on the KuCoin Community Chain (KCC). It is driven by the community, and the core gameplay is card turn-based. In Idle StoneAge, players can:
Gain investment and in-game revenue by fighting, levelling, synthesizing, trading, and pledging cards in the game
Vote on game development, activities, and funding allocation through the project governance token SAX
Gain multiple benefits "
